status.matchAttendance: Highly likely to start next game

previousMatches.stadiumName: Estádio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica

mosaicCards.headline: Your All-time EURO 11 revealed
mosaicCards.comment: After more than 3.5 million votes cast on EURO2016.com and @UEFAEURO, your All-time EURO 11 has been revealed at the Paris City Hall with the selected players immortalised in spray paint.

mosaicCards.headline: Ronaldo and Zlatan chase EURO scoring records
mosaicCards.comment: Will Zlatan Ibrahimović or Cristiano Ronaldo become the first player to score at four EURO final tournaments, and will they break Michel Platini's goals record?

mosaicCards.headline: Cristiano Ronaldo leads way in Player Barometer
mosaicCards.comment: Cristiano Ronaldo is just ahead of Zlatan Ibrahimović and Antoine Griezmann in EURO2016.com's new SOCAR Player Barometer, which is tracking players' form ahead of UEFA EURO 2016.

mosaicCards.headline: Top club and national prizes in the same summer?
mosaicCards.comment: Will one of the UEFA Champions League winners join the select band of players to have lifted the top club and international trophies in the same summer? UEFA.com investigates.

mosaicCards.headline: Stars of UEFA EURO 2016: Cristiano Ronaldo
mosaicCards.comment: A goalscoring machine who will no doubt be eyeing Michel Platini's record for most EURO goals in the summer, Portugal forward Cristiano Ronaldo barely needs any introduction.

mosaicCards.headline: Ronaldo v Griezmann: who would you pick?
mosaicCards.comment: Real Madrid's Cristiano Ronaldo and Atlético Madrid forward Antoine Griezmann go head to head in the UEFA Champions League final, but who will get your Fantasy vote this summer?

mosaicCards.headline: EURO 2012 team of the tournament
mosaicCards.comment: From the archives: Five Spanish players and three Portuguese were the backbone of the UEFA EURO 2012 team of the tournament, two Italy men and one German completing the XI.

mosaicCards.headline: Highlights: The best goals of EURO 2008
mosaicCards.comment: Watch ten of the top strikes from UEFA EURO 2008, featuring goals by Zlatan Ibrahimović, Cristiano Ronaldo and Fernando Torres.

mosaicCards.headline: Renato Sanches joins Ronaldo in Portugal squad
mosaicCards.comment: Just days after his transfer from Benfica to Bayern München was confirmed, 18-year-old midfielder Renato Sanches is alongside Cristiano Ronaldo in the Portugal squad for the finals.

mosaicCards.headline: Who will be top scorer at EURO 2016?
mosaicCards.comment: With a month to go until UEFA EURO 2016, UEFA.com ponders ten possible candidates to be top scorer. Let us know who you think it will be using #EURO2016.

mosaicCards.headline: EURO 2004 team of the tournament
mosaicCards.comment: From the archives: Greece, Portugal and the Czech Republic contributed three players apiece to a 2004 select XI spearheaded by future team-mates Wayne Rooney and Cristiano Ronaldo.

mosaicCards.headline: All-time appearances: Ronaldo and Casillas close in
mosaicCards.comment: Two ex-pros lead the way in the list of all-time EURO appearances, but Cristiano Ronaldo, Iker Casillas and Bastian Schweinsteiger could catch them this summer.

mosaicCards.headline: Portugal's Nani on capoeira and Cristiano Ronaldo
mosaicCards.comment: Portugal winger Nani tells UEFA.com about his martial arts skills, his UEFA Champions League final win and how it was to share a house with Cristiano Ronaldo.

mosaicCards.headline: Jonas's dream five-a-side team
mosaicCards.comment: Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo team up with two greats from the past as Benfica striker Jonas goes for the all-out attack option with his dream selection.

mosaicCards.headline: Star selections: See David Trezeguet’s Team of the Year
mosaicCards.comment: Ex-France forward David Trezeguet raided his old club Juventus when he chose his Team of the Year for 2015. Find out who he picked and click here to vote for your side now.

mosaicCards.headline: Team of the Year contenders await EURO draw
mosaicCards.comment: Twenty-eight of the nominees for UEFA.com's Team of the Year have a vested interest in the UEFA EURO 2016 draw as they wait to find out their opponents next summer.

mosaicCards.headline: Portugal set for home-from-home EURO
mosaicCards.comment: "It will be like playing at home because of the Portuguese community over there," said Portugal coach Fernando Santos after his side confirmed their place in France.

mosaicCards.headline: European Championship's all-time top scorers
mosaicCards.comment: After his double against Gibraltar lifted Robbie Keane within three goals of Cristiano Ronaldo, UEFA.com casts an eye over the top five scorers in UEFA European Championship history.

mosaicCards.headline: Goal and Save of the Season: How it works
mosaicCards.comment: The contenders in UEFA's new goal and save of the season polls were picked by the UEFA Football Committee and UEFA Technical Observers plus UEFA.com reporters.

mosaicCards.headline: Portugal beat Armenia with Ronaldo hat-trick
mosaicCards.comment:
Armenia 2-3 Portugal
Cristiano Ronaldo's hat-trick proves enough for Portugal to win and stay clear in Group I despite Tiago's red card.
